title: (x) geometric slab serif, not Rockwell - ITC Lubalin Graph {Geoff}
content:
Greetings all. A friend asked me to ID this, and I can’t quite place it. It’s not quite Rockwell, not quite Geometric SlabSerif, and not quite Memphis, but close to all. Can anyone nail it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/notrockwell_3797.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [notrockwell.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403072545/http:/typophile.com/files/notrockwell.jpg) | 216.41 KB |
author: ahleman

comments.content:
Hmmm, can’t see the image.

“The image “http://typophile.com/files/notrockwell.jpg” cannot be displayed, because it contains errors.”
That’s probably because it was saved as [CMYK](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403072545/http:/typophile.com/node/18067).
Thanks everyone. Lubalin Graph is definitely right. My apologies about the CMYK thing: I just attached the sample that was sent to me without checking it.
Don’t worry about that. I mentionned it primarily for you because it sometimes slows down the identification process so you might need to wait longer for the answer. :^)
